articles.title: T20 World Cup in focus as India take on West Indies - Reuters
articles.description: India will use the three-match home series against West Indies to identify players for this year's Twenty20 World Cup in Australia and work towards building a bigger talent pool, captain Rohit Sharma said on Tuesday.

articles.title: India secure victory in T20 series opener to keep Windies winless - Reuters
